CustomField.formula: IF( Main_Category__c == 'REGULATION:Covid-Brexit', '#DAC5ED', IF( Main_Category__c == 'DISRUPTION', '#FFACA6', IF( Main_Category__c == 'BAU CX', '#C8FACA', IF( Main_Category__c == 'MARKETING(Sales,Inspirational)', '#FBFFC9', IF( Main_Category__c == 'LOYALTY', '#A6ECFF', IF( Main_Category__c == 'OTHERS' || Main_Category__c == 'OTHER' , '#D9D9D9', '#FFFFFF' ))))))
CustomField.label: Calendar Color
